This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)

full_Dataset <- read_csv("full_Dataset.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
full_Dataset <- subset(full_Dataset, Datum <= "2019-06-08")
```


```{r}
# Load dataset from github
full_Dataset$Datum <- as.Date(full_Dataset$Datum)

Brot <- subset(full_Dataset, Warenname == "Brot")


# Plot
ggplot(subset(Brot, Datum >= "2018-05-01" & Datum <= "2018-06-01"), aes(x=Datum, y=Umsatz)) +
  geom_line()+
  geom_point(aes(color = as.factor(Wochentag), size = as.factor(Hamburg.Feiertage)))
```
```{r}
#"Brot", "Brötchen", "Crossaint", "Konditorei", "Kuchen", "Saisonbrot")
Brot <- subset(full_Dataset, Warenname == "Brot")
Brötchen <- subset(full_Dataset, Warenname == "Brötchen")
Crossaint <- subset(full_Dataset, Warenname == "Crossaint")
Konditorei <- subset(full_Dataset, Warenname == "Konditorei")
Kuchen <- subset(full_Dataset, Warenname == "Kuchen")

Warensplit <- list(Brot, Brötchen, Crossaint, Konditorei, Kuchen)

for (Ware in Warensplit)
  SD <- sd(na.omit(Ware$Umsatz), na.rm = TRUE)
  MEAN <- mean(na.omit(Ware$Umsatz))
  full_Dataset <- full_Dataset[!(full_Dataset$Warenname == Ware$Warenname[1]) & (full_Dataset$Umsatz > MEAN+3*SD)]
  full_Dataset <- full_Dataset[!(full_Dataset$Warenname == Ware$Warenname[1]) & (full_Dataset$Umsatz > MEAN-3*SD)]

```
